plot: Javier and Laura arrive at a hotel after a tedious trip with their son Alvarito. There, a bunch of child supervisors are promoting the famous 'Nile rout'. Javier has just one thing in his mind: to leave his son in the big hall filled with inflatable play houses and children's fun fairs and go up to bed with his wife. However, there's just one little problem: Alvarito is afraid of Crocodile Nile.   Written by  Anonymous
title: El cocodrilo Nilo
